page.title: 04WEATHER IN HELMSHORE.
page.content:
The weather around Helmshore is not very good and it rains quite a lot.
Helmshore is in a valley and the clouds can't go away very easily, so it rains longer than in most places in Britain.
The weather sometimes puts people off but it is not that bad because of the lovely countryside and walks that are to be found within the area. In the evenings it is usually mild, with many red skies on summer evenings.
It rains quite a lot, but Helmshore is still a very pleasant place to visit.
